column5: Abū ‘Abd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Ismā‘īl ibn Ibrāhīm ibn al-Mughīrah ibn Bardizbah al-Ju‘fī al-Bukhārī
Abū al-Ḥusayn ‘Asākir ad-Dīn Muslim ibn al-Ḥajjāj ibn Muslim ibn Ward ibn Kawshādh al-Qushayrī an-Naysābūrī
Aḥmad ibn Shu`ayb ibn Alī ibn Sīnān Abū `Abd ar-Raḥmān al-Nasā'ī
Abu Dawud Sulaymān ibn al-Ashʿath al-Azdi as-Sijistani
Abū ʻAbdillāh Muḥammad ibn Yazīd Ibn Mājah al-Rabʻī al-Qazwīn
Ahmad bin Muhammad bin Hanbal Abu `Abd Allah al-Shaybani
Mālik ibn Anas ibn Mālik ibn Abī 'Āmir al-Asbahī
